name: Business Badges
author: Qualisure

sections.description:
English:
Business Badges allows you to display fully customizable social badges on your website, like Google Business badge, Google Plus badge or facebook badge. It creates a widget.
Engage people, be in more circles and get more followers.
Google+, Google business, Google Maps

Español:
Business Badges permite insertar facilmente una insignia de google en su sitio web. Este plugin crea un widget para permitir la inserción en cualquier parte permitida por el tema.
Para insertar una insignia de facebook son necesarias varias claves que se pueden obtener en la página de facebook.
Este plugin ha sido revisado por el equipo de WordPress y el código es abierto y gratuito.

Configuring and Using the Plugin

Support

For questions, feature requests, and support concerning the Business Badges plugin, please refer to http://qualisure.es/contacto.
sections.installation:
You can install the Business Badges plugin from your WordPress Dashboard or manually via FTP. For more details, visit http://qualisure.es

From WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to ‘Plugins -> Add New’ from your WordPress dashboard.
  2. Search for Business Badges and install it.
  3. Activate the plugin from Plugins menu.
  4. Add any widget to your widget zone from Appearance -> Widgets and configure the widget options.

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file: business-badges.zip
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Upload thebusiness-badges folder to your /wp-content/plugins directory (do not rename the folder)
  4. Activate the plugin from Plugins menu.
  5. Add any widget to your widget zone from ‘Appearance -> Widgets’ and configure the widget options.
